name: Ranch Escape
description:
Ranch Escape - The horse collecting arcade game

Oh no! - The horses have escaped the ranch and are running free.

Can you gather them back to the ranch?

Test your skill at collecting as many horses as you can within the time limit - Try against your friends.

Who can collect the most?

Instructions:

- Tap your screen where you want to run.

- Run into a horse to collect.

- Bring the horse back to the ranch building to score.

Tip:

- You can collect more that one horse at a time!


Thanks for playing
